name: EmoteGuesser
description:
EmoteGuesser is a very simple game about guessing 7TV Emotes from a specified Twitch channel! It's more challenging than it sounds, but you'll have to check it out yourself!

Contribute to translations! https://crowdin.com/project/emoteguesser

Contribute to the game! https://github.com/Xslash58/emoteguesser
